text.div:
ListStatus

The current state of the list

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/list-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
current CurrentThe list is considered to be an active part of the patient's record.
retired RetiredThe list is "old" and should no longer be considered accurate or relevant.
entered-in-error Entered In ErrorThe list was never accurate. It is retained for medico-legal purposes only.

name: ListStatus
description: The current state of the list

concept.definition: The list is considered to be an active part of the patient's record.
The list is "old" and should no longer be considered accurate or relevant.
The list was never accurate.  It is retained for medico-legal purposes only.
